content: Combat sport events in 2022 ***ONE on Prime Video 2: Xiong vs. Lee 3*** (also known as ***ONE Fight Night 2*** outside North America) was a [combat sport](/wiki/Combat_sport) event produced by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) that took place on October 1, 2022 at the [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. ## Background A [ONE Women's Strawweight World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Women's_Strawweight_World_Championship) bout and trilogy between current champion [Xiong Jing Nan](/wiki/Xiong_Jing_Nan) and current [ONE Women's Atomweight Champion](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Women's_Atomweight_World_Championship) [Angela Lee](/wiki/Angela_Lee) headlined the event. The pairing first met at ONE: A New Era on March 31, 2019 where Xiong won by knockout in the fifth round. Their second meeting took place at ONE: Century on October 13, 2019 in [ONE Women's Atomweight World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Women's_Strawweight_World_Championship) bout, where Lee defended the title by submission in the fifth round. A [ONE Featherweight Kickboxing World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Featherweight_Kickboxing_World_Championship) bout between current champion [Superbon Singha Mawynn](/wiki/Superbon_Singha_Mawynn) and former [K-1 Super Welterweight Champion](/wiki/List_of_K-1_champions#K-1_Super_Welterweight_Championship) (also [2022 ONE Featherweight Kickboxing World Grand Prix Champion](/wiki/2022_in_ONE_Championship#ONE_Kickboxing_Featherweight_Grand_Prix_bracket)) [Chingiz Allazov](/wiki/Chingiz_Allazov) was expected to take place as the co-main event. However, Allazov forced to withdraw due to an injury and was replaced by #5 ranked contender [Tayfun Özcan](/wiki/Tayfun_%C3%96zcan) who scheduled against former [Glory Lightweight Champion](/wiki/Glory_(kickboxing)#Glory_Lightweight_Championship) [Marat Grigorian](/wiki/Marat_Grigorian) in lead card and while Grigorian was booked to face Jamal Yusupov. In turn, Superbon and Yusupov withdrew from the event due to illness, so Özcan and Grigorian stepped back into the original pairing. The inaugural [ONE Flyweight Submission Grappling World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions) bout between [Mikey Musumeci](/wiki/Mikey_Musumeci) and Cleber Sousa took place at the event. It was also the first submission grappling title in the promotion's history. At the weigh-ins, two fighters missed weight for their respective bouts. [Dangkongfah Banchamek](/wiki/Dangkongfah_Kiatpetnoi_Gym) weighed in at 115.25 pounds, 0.25 lbs over the atomweight non-title fight limit. Jihin Radzuan weighed in at 120.25 pounds, 5.25 lbs over the atomweight non-title fight limit. Both bouts proceeded at catchweight. Dangkongfah was fined 20% of their purse, which went to their opponent [Anissa Meksen](/wiki/Anissa_Meksen); Radzuan was fined 30% of their purse, which went to their opponent [Stamp Fairtex](/wiki/Stamp_Fairtex); [Superbon Singha Mawynn](/wiki/Superbon_Singha_Mawynn) and Jamal Yusupov have both not been medically cleared and both withdrew from the event. ## Results Main card (Amazon Prime Video)Weight classMethodRoundTimeNotesWomen's Strawweight[Xiong Jing Nan](/wiki/Xiong_Jing_Nan) (c)def.[Angela Lee](/wiki/Angela_Lee)Decision (unanimous)55:00[b]Flyweight Submission Grappling[Mikey Musumeci](/wiki/Mikey_Musumeci)def.Cleber SousaDecision (unanimous)110:00[c]Catchweight (120.75 lbs)[Stamp Fairtex](/wiki/Stamp_Fairtex)def.Jihin RadzuanDecision (unanimous)35:00[d]FeatherweightIlya Freymanovdef.[Martin Nguyen](/wiki/Martin_Nguyen)TKO (submission to knees)13:33LightweightHalil Amirdef.[Timofey Nastyukhin](/wiki/Timofey_Nastyukhin)TKO (punches)20:58Lead card (YouTube / Watch ONE)Featherweight Kickboxing[Marat Grigorian](/wiki/Marat_Grigorian)def.[Tayfun Özcan](/wiki/Tayfun_%C3%96zcan)Decision (unanimous)33:00FeatherweightOh Ho-taekdef.Ryogo TakahashiDecision (split)35:00Catchweight (115.75 lbs) Muay Thai[Anissa Meksen](/wiki/Anissa_Meksen)def.[Dangkongfah Banchamek](/wiki/Dangkongfah_Kiatpetnoi_Gym)Decision (unanimous)33:00[e]Heavyweight Kickboxing[Rade Opačić](/wiki/Rade_Opa%C4%8Di%C4%87)def.[Giannis Stoforidis](/wiki/Giannis_Stoforidis)KO (punches)21:52[f] ## Bonus awards The following fighters received $50,000 bonuses. - **Performance of the Night: Ilya Freymanov** and **Halil Amir** - Martial Arts portal - [2022 in ONE Championship](/wiki/2022_in_ONE_Championship) - [List of ONE Championship events](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_events) - [List of current ONE fighters](/wiki/List_of_current_ONE_fighters)
title: ONE on Prime Video 2
